wikipedia_page.main: Professor Peter Nailor (16 December 1928 – 5 April 1996) was a British civil servant and academic, who served as Professor of Politics at the University of Lancaster, Professor of History at the Royal Naval College, Greenwich, and Provost of Gresham College.

link_mentions.page: List of Wadham College, Oxford people
response: * Peter Nailor, civil servant, intellectual and professor
